description: > ## Creating model Schema   ### 1. *User*    - First Name     - Last Name    - Email    - Password    - Confirm password    - Account Type    - Additonal Detail -> profile schema    - Courses Owned -> courses schema     - profile Image     - course Progress -> courseProgress schema ### 2. *Profile*  - Gender  - Date of Birth  - bio   - phone no  - social media Links
